scripts.test:workflow: node -e "const {RemotionWorkflow} = require('./src/mastra/workflows/remotion-workflow'); const workflow = new RemotionWorkflow(); workflow.createVideoWorkflow(['Test 1', 'Test 2']).then(console.log).catch(console.error)"
scripts.test:all: npm run test:api && npm run test:workflow
scripts.workflow:demo: node -e "const {RemotionWorkflow} = require('./src/mastra/workflows/remotion-workflow'); const workflow = new RemotionWorkflow(); workflow.createVideoWorkflow(['Demo Video 1', 'Demo Video 2']).then(r => console.log('Workflow:', r)).then(() => workflow.monitorWorkflow(['demo-job-1']).then(s => console.log('Status:', s))).catch(console.error)"
